original_text: But now he has reconciled you by Christ’s physical body through death to present you holy in his sight, without blemish and free from accusation—
korean_text: 이제는 그의 육체의 죽음으로 말미암아 화목하게 하사 너희를 거룩하고 흠 없고 책망할 것이 없는 자로 그 앞에 세우고자 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: But now he has reconciled you
by Christ's physical body through death
to present you holy in his sight
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 그의 보시기에 거룩하게 나타내기 위해
